short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps you use chatgpt anywhere on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension that helps you write text using AI in any website! With this extension, you can instantly generate fresh, powerful, and accurate text with minimal effort. Whether you're attempting to write a blog post, email, or other documents, this extension can help you quickly and efficiently produce amazing results. It leverages the latest in AI technology to provide you with the best text possible, ensuring accuracy and readability. Plus, it's easy to use and customisable to fit your needs. Try it today and experience the power of AI-powered writing!

Enter your open AI key and you are up and running. 
The key does not get sent anywhere, everything happens from your browser.

Use keyword "gen: <msg to generate>"

To learn how to create such extensions visit - https://medium.com/@kashyapgajera/how-to-build-a-chrome-extension-in-2023-8e0e55328236
